exceptions.tactic: rewrite (vec_split_app X n m (Vector.cons X x n v) w).
exceptions.exn: In environment X : Type n, m : nat x : X v : vec X n w : vec X m The term "X" has type "Type" while it is expected to have type "vec ?X ?n".

exceptions.tactic: rewrite (vec_app_split X n m (Vector.cons X x n v w)).
exceptions.exn: In environment X : Type n, m : nat x : X v : vec X n w : vec X m The term "X" has type "Type" while it is expected to have type "nat".
In environment X : Type n, m : nat x : X v : vec X n w : vec X m Unable to unify "x ## vec_app v w" with "vec_app (x ## v) w".

original: rewrite (vec_split_app X n m (Vector.cons X x n v) w). rewrite (vec_app_split X n m (Vector.cons X x n v w)). reflexivity.
